publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7157.1 Gavin Brown: The Future of Scotland’s Supported Employment Workplaces—As an amendment to motion (S3M-7157) in the name of Lewis Macdonald, insert at end ", and, in so doing, take account of the fact that there may be a small minority of public bodies that will face practical difficulties in achieving this aim, and, in addition, believes that main contractors should be actively encouraged, on a voluntary basis, to use supported employment organisations as subcontractors on public sector contracts."
